select * from ( SELECT c.name, c.logo,DATE_FORMAT(sc.`create_time`, '%Y/%m/%d') AS createTime,t.`task_type_text` AS taskTypeText,sc.`level`,sc.`comment`, sc.id AS commentId FROM (SELECT * FROM bill WHERE `hotel_id` = #{id} AND pay_type = 1) b INNER JOIN service_comment sc ON b.id = sc.`bill_id` INNER JOIN task t ON t.id = b.`task_id` INNER JOIN company c ON c.id = b.`hr_company_id`
and c.name like concat('%', #{name} , '%')
and t.`task_type_text` like concat('%', #{taskTypeText} , '%')
order by sc.create_time desc )k LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(e.`text`) AS STATUS, cr.service_comment_id FROM evaluate_comment_relation cr INNER JOIN evaluate e ON e.id = cr.evaluate_id GROUP BY cr.service_comment_id ) n ON k.commentId = n.service_comment_id

select * from ( SELECT u.`nickname` AS name,u.`avatar` AS logo,DATE_FORMAT(b.create_time, '%Y/%m/%d') AS createTime,t.`task_type_text` AS taskTypeText,sc.`level`,sc.`comment`,sc.id AS commentId FROM ( SELECT * FROM bill WHERE `hr_company_id` = #{id} AND pay_type = 2 ) b INNER JOIN service_comment sc ON sc.`bill_id` = b.id INNER JOIN USER u ON u.`worker_id` = b.`worker_id` INNER JOIN task t ON t.id = b.task_id
and u.`nickname` like concat('%', #{name} , '%')
and t.task_type_text like concat('%', #{taskTypeText} , '%')
order by sc.create_time desc )k LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(e.`text`) AS STATUS, cr.service_comment_id FROM evaluate_comment_relation cr INNER JOIN evaluate e ON e.id = cr.evaluate_id GROUP BY cr.service_comment_id ) n ON k.commentId = n.service_comment_id

SELECT c.`name`,c.logo,tw.`task_type_text` AS taskTypeText,DATE_FORMAT(wl.create_time, '%Y/%m/%d') AS createTime, GROUP_CONCAT(wl.status) AS STATUS,wl.task_worker_id AS twId FROM ( SELECT * FROM task_worker WHERE worker_id = #{id} ) tw INNER JOIN company c ON c.id = tw.`hotel_id` inner JOIN ( SELECT create_time,STATUS,task_worker_id FROM work_log WHERE employer_confirm_status = 1 ) wl ON wl.task_worker_id = tw.id
and c.name like concat('%', #{name} , '%')
and tw.`task_type_text` like concat('%', #{taskTypeText} , '%')
GROUP BY createTime,twId
